sentences.en: He cannot prevent the reader from preferring Ethan Brand to the cloddish villagers of the tale.
sentences.cn: 读者还是喜欢伊桑?布兰德而讨厌故事里那些土头土脑的乡民. 这他是阻止不了的.

sentences.en: He is a real rustic . However fashionable his clothes always looks cloddish.
sentences.cn: 他就是俗气, 无论穿多时髦的衣服,也是土里土气的.

sentences.en: He is a real rustic . However fashionable his clothes, he always looks cloddish.
sentences.cn: 他就是个老赶, 无论穿多时髦的衣服, 也是土里土气的.

words.tran_cn: 粗鲁的；土块一样的；土里土气的

trans.tran_cn: 土块一样的，土里土气的，粗鲁的
